name: Simple Orange-Carrot Juice
description: A simple carrot juice sweetened with fresh oranges and spiced with ginger.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon (1/4 ounce) fresh ginger juice, from about a 1/2-inch piece ginger
1 cup carrot juice from about 1/2 pound carrots
1 cup orange juice from about 3 oranges (2 peeled, 1 left unpeeled)

recipeInstructions.text: Juice ginger, carrots, and oranges in order listed. Stir juices together and serve.
